H0.text: Which poet wrote The Whitsun Weddings. Philip Larkin

H1.text: Which poet wrote The Whitsun Weddings. W.H. Auden

H2.text: Which poet wrote The Whitsun Weddings. Ted Hughes

H3.text: Which poet wrote The Whitsun Weddings. Larkinian

A4.text: The Whitsun Weddings is a collection of 32 poems by Philip Larkin.

A5.text: It contains many of Larkin's best known poems, such as 'The Whitsun Weddings'.
